messages.message:
While adding the retention period change for AXA <#C080JH18SJG|>
I noticed that in MySQL when you delete rows, it doesnâ€™t free up space. You need to run OPTIMIZE table and ANALYZE table. These steps recreate the table and take some time.
Something to keep in mind :sweat_smile:
cc @mfichman @Jeff
Hm yes, this is true. Good reason to keep the database size small in the first place by regularly pruning it.
